t: OMG, is Blomberg a Germany brand? The worst brand I ever used. - RedFlagDeals.com Forums
s: I don't mind if I get any down vote, because Blomberg is garbage. My dishwasher died within 3 years after I bought the new condo, and I can not find someone who can fix, one guy said the pump is broken and the cheapest pump he can find on amazon is more than $500. I don't know why so many builders are using this garbage brand...
